{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Planex |model=BRC-W108G |revision= |ean=4941250151684 |asin= |fcc_date=05/06/2005 |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WRTO-126G |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=SA3-AGN1223AR0300 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP425;FWIXP425BB; |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F640J3C-120 |ram1= |ram1_brand=GLT |ram1_model=GLT51280L16-6TC |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Airgo AGN1223AR-03 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (long) |wi1_chip1_brand=Airgo |wi1_chip1_model=AGN103BB |wi1_chip2_brand=Airgo |wi1_chip2_model=AGN100RF |wi1_chip3_brand=Airgo |wi1_chip3_model=AGN100RF |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model=KS8995M |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=brcw108g |default_ssid_regex=^brcw108g$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:90:CC |oui_eth= }} :[http://www.planex.co.jp/product/broadlanner/brc-w108g.shtml Product page (JP)] {{â€¢}} [http://www.planex.net/product/router/brc-w108g.htm Product page (US)]
Per '''Planex''''s specs, this device uses an XScale IXP425 (at 266MHz). :OEM: [[Gemtek]] WRTO-126G
*[http://bb.watch.impress.co.jp/cda/review/10091.html Review with internal images (JP)] :FWIXP425BB processor
The wireless module appears to be an [[Airgo AGN1223AR-03]]. :The FCC ID of the AGN1223AR-03 has been assigned to this entry.
